207b3('dul ba): na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /ra gan dang / zangs ma dang / lcags dang / rno lcags dang / ro nye dang / zha nye dang / khro chu la reg pa la ltung ba med do/ /zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la
207b4('dul ba): nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do/ / //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po so gsum pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal
207b5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na tsam pa ka na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa/ bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bzang po sbyin pa zhig 'dug pa des/ de bzhin
207b6('dul ba): gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang / skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa snying dang / mig 'phrog pa/ mtho ris kyi
207b7('dul ba): them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug nas der dge slong mang po dag dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/ de dag gis dgag dbye byas nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag cag mnyan yod du ston pa dang /
208a1('dul ba): dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'i/ bdag cag la gos dag byin cig /khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa
208a2('dul ba): dag / 'di na gos bzang po dag ma mchis te/ don mthun dag mchis zhes grag gi /don mthun dag mchis kyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig dang / de nas gos bzang po dag 'jal
208a3('dul ba): te gsol lo/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te gros bzang po dag med na/ gos ngan po dag byin cig /'phags pa dag /bdag ni/ bzang po sbyin pa lags na/ ji ltar
208a4('dul ba): bdag gis ngan pa dag gsol bar bgyi/ gal te khyed cag rings na/ gos kyi rin kaR+sha pa Na dag snoms la bzhud cig /khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyis kaR+sha pa Na dag bkag
208a5('dul ba): bas bdag cag mi len to/ /'phags pa dag /'di ltar bdag la ma byin pa ni/ mi mnga'i/ gos ngan pa dag sbyin du mi rung ngo / /dge slong de dag gis kaR+sha pa Na dag ma blangs par gos
208a6('dul ba): ngan pa dag kho nas dong ste/ mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed cag gis dbyar gnas pa'i gos kyi rnyed pa ma rnyed dam
208a7('dul ba): ci nas gang gi phyir khyed cag gos dag ngan par gyur/ ma rnyed do/ /khyed cag gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs/ tsam par ro/ /khyim bdag gang la brten/ che ge mo zhig la'o/ /khyim
208b1('dul ba): bdag de bzang po sbyin pa zhes grags so/ /de'i phyir ma rnyed do/ /de'i phyir de dag gis skabs de/ rgyas par brjod pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
208b2('dul ba): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag kyang gos kyi rin dag sbyin par byed la/ nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyi/ ngas nyan thos rnams la rung
208b3('dul ba): bar bya ba cung zhig gnang bar bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang
208b4('dul ba): dge slong gis zhal ta byed pa spro bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis zhal ta byed pa gang spro bar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ra ba pa'am/ dge bsnyen spro bar
208b5('dul ba): bya ste/ kun dga' ra ba pa zhes bya ba ni/ rung bar byed pa'o/ /dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni/ gsum la skyabs su song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba'o/ /dge slong dag yul gzhan du 'dong ba na/ de
208b6('dul ba): dag 'di na bdag cag la sbyin pa dag 'ga' yang med do/ /zhes 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag de nyid ji srid du gson pa dang / 'dug pa dang / 'tsho
208b7('dul ba): ba dang / sdod pa'i bar du shin tu ring du song ba yang nyams pa med do/ /dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rin dag rnyed la sbyin bdag med nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes te mi len pa'i skabs de/
209a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong gi mdun du 'greng
209a2('dul ba): ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
209a3('dul ba): bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di byin gyis brlab bo/ /dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par
209a4('dul ba): bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mtha' 'khob dag tu gtsug lag khang dag byed du bcug nas de na dus dang dus su skrag pa dag byung nas
209a5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par bor te byer ro/ /ma byin par len pa dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par rig nas gtsug lag khang bcom pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
209a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi dbyig dang gser sbas te 'gro bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sba bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang gis sba
209a7('dul ba): par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ra ba pa'am/ dge bsnyen gyis sba bar bya'o/ /gang dag sbed par byed pa de dag nyid rku bar byed nas bcom
209b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis sba bar bya'o/ /dge bsnyen dad pa can med na/ dge tshul gyis sba bar bya'o/ /dge tshul med na/ dge slong dag gis rang gis sba
209b2('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /de la dong brko bar bya ba yod nas gang gis brko bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ra ba pa'am/ dge bsnyen gyis brko bar bya'o/ /de
209b3('dul ba): nyid rku bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis brko bar bya'o/ /dge bsnyen dad pa can med na/ dge tshul gyis brko bar bya'o/ /dge tshul med
209b4('dul ba): na/ dge slong dag gis rang gis brko bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa dang bral na/ rnam pa de lta bu nyid kyis phyung ste dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /ngas phongs pa'i dus dag tu gnang
209b5('dul ba): ba gang yin pa de/ bde ba'i gnas skabs dag tu spyad par mi bya ste/ spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis
209b6('dul ba): nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /gser dang dngul dag la reg pa'i spang ba ste/ bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi
209b7('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe na thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ngo / /
210a1('dul ba): zhes sgra grags te/ de'i nyan thos rnams 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag phyed pas/ gang dag de la mchod
210a2('dul ba): pa dag byed pa de dag ni/ shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / gsal ba che ba dang / rgyas pa che bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/
210a3('dul ba): shes ldan dag/ yul dbus su 'dong ngo / /der khe spogs mang po yang bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la yang mchod par bya'o/ /zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa de
210a4('dul ba): dag zong thogs te de la dbus su 'phags nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/ /mnyan yod na shes pa can rtsis mkhas pa zhig 'dug pa des/ byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs zhes
210a5('dul ba): thos nas des bsam pa/ song ste je bltas na/ der cung zad 'thob bo/ /snyam nas/ des cung zad dmigs pas kyang shes/ cung zad rtog ges kyang shes nas des song ste ded dpon la ming dang rus nas
210a6('dul ba): brjod cing / 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod kyi ma ni/ ming 'di zhes bya/ khyod kyi pha ni/ ming 'di zhes bya/ khyod kyi rdzas ni/ 'di snyed cig 'ongs so/ /nyi ma ga ge mo
210a7('dul ba): zhig la ni/ khal 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /khe spogs ni/ 'di snyed cig 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / ded dpon des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang dag 'bar ba dang /
210b1('dul ba): gsal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul byed ces grags pa de dag las/ 'ga' zhig 'di yin gor ma chag snyam nas/ des de la dad pas byang lam gyi nags kyi 'bras bus slong
210b2('dul ba): phor bkang ste phyin nas la ba srin bu'i mdog lta bu zhig kyang bskon no/ /shes pa can des/ de blangs shing gyon te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi gan du song ba dang / de dag gis de mthong nas
210b3('dul ba): smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyis mgo bzlog ste nyal ba gang zhig las thob/ des smras pa/ byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs nas der kho bo ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod nas/ des
210b4('dul ba): kho bo la dad pas dad par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shes pa can/ bdag cag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag rtag tu khyed cag la tha ga pa dag dang / phreng rgyud dag dang 'bru
210b5('dul ba): mar mkhan dag las/ gzhan pa mi gtso bo 'ga' yang mngon par dad par mi byed do/ /zhes mtho 'tsham par byed kyi/ khyod la ba 'di gyon te song la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag gi snying dag gas par gyis
210b6('dul ba): shig / de ltar bya'o/ /zhes smras te/ de nas shes pa can de/ la ba de gyon nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs pa
210b7('dul ba): rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/ rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/ rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o/ /snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong bar mi 'jog
211a1('dul ba): pas| nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des/ shes pa can de thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /de nas nye dgas bsam pa/ gcer bu pa ngan
211a2('dul ba): pa 'di la ba bzang po zhig gyon te 'ongs kyi/ gal te bdag gis de ma 'phrog na/ nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo / /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod gcer bu pa
211a3('dul ba): yin la/ la ba 'di lta bu gyon na/ phyir babs sam ci/ kho bo phyir ma babs te/ 'di ltar byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs nas der kho bos ded dpon la ming dang rus brjod nas/ des
211a4('dul ba): kho bo la dad pas dad pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /ma legs so/ /ma legs so/ /khyod kyis rgas pa'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims 'chal ba kun tu spyad do/ /tshur shog/ 'dug
211a5('dul ba): cig dang chos bstan par bya'o/ /shes pa can de/ nye dga'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / nye dga' yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas de la sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so/ /drug
211a6('dul ba): sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams su skyes so/ /snyam du sems la/ gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na/ nyan
211a7('dul ba): pa po dag rang gi sha gang yin pa de yang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su
211b1('dul ba): skyes so/ /snyam du sems par 'gyur ba yin pas/ nye dgas shes pa can de la smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyi ston pa ni/ ngan pa la mos pa yin te/ gal te de bzang po 'dod par gyur na/ des
211b2('dul ba): khyed cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang / zas ro brgya ba dang ldan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya ba yang gnang bar 'gyur ba zhig na ma gnang ngo / /kho bo cag gi ston pa ni/ bzang po la mos pa
211b3('dul ba): yin pas des kho bo cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang / zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya ba yang gnang ngo / /gal te khyod la ba 'di lta bu gyon te slong mo la 'gro bar gyur na/
211b4('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis/ shes pa can 'dis tshul khrims 'chal ba kun tu spyad do/ /snyam du shes pas khyod kyis slong mo yang mi rnyed par 'gyur gyi khyod kyi la ba 'di kho
211b5('dul ba): bol byin cig dang / kho bos khyod la la ba gzhan zhig sbyin no/ /kho bo la ba 'di gyon te bsod snyoms la 'jug pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis kho bo mthong nas btsun pa
211b6('dul ba): nye dgas la ba 'di lta bu ga las rnyed ces zer na/ kho bos de dag la 'di skad ces/ shes pa can che ge mo zhig gis byin no/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ des na de dag gis shes pa can dad
211b7('dul ba): pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /snyam du shes par 'gyur zhing / de dag gis khyod slong mo la zhugs pa la chang dang nu rtsis slong phor bkang ste sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'
212a1('dul ba): bzhes shig / nye dgas smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag ni/ tshul khrims 'chal ba yin pas khyod de dag gi tshig thos nas
212a2('dul ba): yang phyir 'phrog tu 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do/ /btsun pa nye dga'/ ci/ kho bo'i la ba 'di tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag dbang ba yin nam/ la ba 'di ni/ kho bo nyid dbang ba
212a3('dul ba): yin gyi/ bzhes shig dang slar 'phrog tu mi 'chi'o/ /nye dgas la ba de blangs nas/ la ba rtsub po gzhan zhig de la byin nas shes pa can de/ la ba rtsub po de gyon nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
212a4('dul ba): rnams kyi gan du phyir song ba dang / de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod kyis yang mgo bsgyur te nyal ba gang zhig las thob/ des smras pa/ 'di ni/ glo gzhan nas grub
212a5('dul ba): pa yin no/ /ji ltar gyur/ kho bos la ba de btsun pa nye dga' la byin nas/ des kyang kho bo la la ba 'di byin to/ /de dag gis spyos te smras pa/ shes pa can/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams
212a6('dul ba): ni| yu bu cag gson pas kyang mi dga' ba yin no/ /drug sde dag ji lta bar gzhan de lta ma yin la/ nye dga' ji lta bar drug sde gzhan de lta ma yin no/ /gal te khyod kyis dge slong
212a7('dul ba): gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig la byin par gyur na/ kho bo cag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed na/ khyod kyis nye dga' la byin te/ de ni/ bdag cag las zong gis kyang khrag gi phyis bu
212b1('dul ba): lan par 'dod pa yin gyi/ gal te la ba khyer te 'ong na/ de lta na legs/ gal te khyer te mi 'ong na/ kho bo cag gis khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas dbyung bar bya zhing / tshul shing
212b2('dul ba): yang dbyung bar bya/ spang leb khri'u yang bskyur bar bya/ slong phor yang khas dbub par bya/ 'khar ba yang dor bar bya'o/ /de skrag nas nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang / nye dgas thag ring po kho na nas de 'ong
212b3('dul ba): ba mthong nas des bsam pa/ shes pa can 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'di ni/ bdag gi la ba 'phrog par byed pa yin snyam nas/ de gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs nas sgo bcad de 'dug go/ shes pa
212b4('dul ba): can des bsgo brdung bar brtsams te btsun pa nye dga' btsun pa nye dga'/ zhes bos pa dang / nye dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go /dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ shes pa can/ khyod la btsun pa nye dgas ci bya/
212b5('dul ba): des smras pa/ des kho bo'i la ba zhig khyer ro/ /shes pa can/ gal te khyod la ba 'dod na/ song la bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su sgrubs shig /de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shes
212b6('dul ba): pa can de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed shes pa can thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba la ltos shig/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin
212b7('dul ba): 'tshal/ 'di ni/ la ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ gal te la ba thob na/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas shes pa can de phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
213a1('dul ba): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ btsun pa nye dgas bdag gi la ba 'tshal ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la slar stsal du gsol cig/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la la ba
213a2('dul ba): slar stsal du ma stsal na/ 'di ltar bdag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas phyung bar 'gyur zhing / tshul shing yang phyung bar 'gyur/ spang leb khri'u yang bskyur bar 'gyur/ slong phor yang
213a3('dul ba): khas phub par 'gyur/ 'khar ba yang bor bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la nye dga'i gan du song ste/ shes pa
213a4('dul ba): can gyi la ba phyir byin cig / gal te mi sbyin na/ shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do/ /zhes gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun
213a5('dul ba): pa| bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang / nye dgas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsam pa/
213a6('dul ba): shes pa can gyis pho nya 'di lta bu khrid de 'ong bas 'dis kho bo'i la ba 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nye dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan
213a7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa can gyi la ba phyir byin cig/ gal te 'di'i la ba phyir myur bar ma byin na/ shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas
213b1('dul ba): de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes byung ngo / /nye dgas smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ston pa'i bka' mnyan par zad kyi/ gzhan du na sgre byi gcer bu 'di phrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba bas
213b2('dul ba): gal te shes pa can sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur la/ de dag thams cad khrag tsha ba
213b3('dul ba): skyugs te kha dag cing dus byed par gyur kyang nye dga'i spu'i rtse mo tsam yang mi g.yo ste/ 'on kyang bzhud cig dang sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang / nye dgas smras pa/ kwa'i
213b4('dul ba): gcer bu pa nyon cig / khyod kyi ston pa rdzun ma des brdzun du smra bas 'jig rten bslus nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ de'i lce la thong gshol lnga brgyas rmed par byed na/ khyod
213b5('dul ba): kyang de bas kyang rdzun ma chen po yin pas/ khyod kyi lce la yang thong gshol stong gis rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang kho bo'i la ba khyod kyis spyad na/ ci/ kho bos kyang khyod kyi la ba spyad snyam mam/
213b6('dul ba): btsun pa nye dga' ma lags so/ /nye dga' de'i la ba des 'doms kyi phyogs thams cad phyis nas bzhi ltab tu bltab ste lag pa g.yon pa'i stong du bzhag nas lag pa g.yas pas thal lcag gis
213b7('dul ba): bsnun pa dang rim pa thams cad rdol bar gyur nas smras pa/ shes pa can/ lag pa gnyis rkyongs shig/ des lag pa gnyis brkyangs pa dang nye dgas gang gis de khas bub tu sgyel bar
214a1('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shugs kyis la ba lag tu phyin pa dang / de khas bub tu sgyel nas/ nye dgas rdog pas bsnun te smras pa/ gcer bu pa sgre byi/ gtsug lag
214a2('dul ba): khang sla btsas ma gtal bar song zhig / btsun pa nye dga'/ gal te ma gum na/ mchis te slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o/ /de ni/ re zhig byung ba yin gyi/ bcom ldan
214a3('dul ba): 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni/ ma mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
214a4('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed
214a5('dul ba): par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar
214a6('dul ba): kun tu sbyor bar byed ce na/ kun tu rtsom par byed/ yul tshol bar byed/ shing rta gsog par byed/ yul du 'gro ba'i rdzas shom par byed/ le'u pa dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang /
214a7('dul ba): smyu gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed do/ /ji ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed ce na/ brgya shas dang / bcu shas dang / bcu gnyis shas kyi phyir dpang po dang / gro
214b1('dul ba): ga dang / snag cha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed do/ /ji ltar bun 'gyed par byed ce na/ nas dang / 'bru rnying pa gser phye dang nyi sde'i phyir gtong ba dang
214b2('dul ba): gzhal ba'i snod dang / bre'u chung dang / phul dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed do/ /de ltar bun 'gyed par byed do/ /ji ltar skyed 'gyed par byed ce na/ dung gi tshogs
214b3('dul ba): kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / mu tig tshogs kyi phyir bai DUR+Ya tshogs gtong bar byed cing / dbang po dang / gro ga
214b4('dul ba): dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed do/ /de ltar skyed 'gyed par byed do/ /ji ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir mngon mtshan
214b5('dul ba): can gtong bar byed do/ de ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir mngon mtshan med pa gtong
214b6('dul ba): bar byed do/ /de ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan
214b7('dul ba): can gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon mtshan can
215a1('dul ba): ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can ma yin pa gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dag
215a2('dul ba): shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ ma log /ma spangs/ so sor ma spangs pa yin te/ 'di ltar mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar
215a3('dul ba): byed| rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/ /
215a4('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /
215a5('dul ba): byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed na/ shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag
215a6('dul ba): rnams la bye brag ci yod/ bsam pa ni/ ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni/ ci yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar
215a7('dul ba): kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs
215b1('dul ba): 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs
215b2('dul ba): pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/
215b3('dul ba): mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa/ de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin
215b4('dul ba): no| |zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu
215b5('dul ba): yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i
215b6('dul ba): gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ drug sde dag gam/
215b7('dul ba): gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/ /mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa du ma'o/ /byed na zhes bya ba ni/ kun tu spyod par byed pa dang / rab tu sbyor bar byed
216a1('dul ba): pa dang / bun 'gyed par byed pa dang / skyed 'gyed par byed pa lhag par spyod pa byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas
216a2('dul ba): ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas yul gyi tha snyad kyi zong
216a3('dul ba): kun tu sbyor bar byed cing / de de la shing rta dang / glang dang / gla mi dang / dpang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ sho gam dang / la gcan dang /
216a4('dul ba): gru btsas sbyin par byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa dag bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod
216a5('dul ba): pas dbyig gam/ gser rab tu sbyor bar byed cing / de de la dpang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du
216a6('dul ba): nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa dag bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nas dang / 'bru'i bun 'gyed par byed cing / de de la gzhal blugs
216a7('dul ba): dang / bre'u chung dang / phul dang / dpang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/
216b1('dul ba): rnyed pa bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnyed pa 'dod pas dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong
216b2('dul ba): bar byed pa dang / mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir baiDUR+Ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing / de de la dbang po dang / gro ga dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag
216b3('dul ba): gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi
216b4('dul ba): bca' bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i li tsa byi dag gi khang pa
216b5('dul ba): drug brtsegs dang bdun brtsegs su byed do/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dag kyang drug brtsegs dang bdun brtsegs su byed pas/ de dag mtho
216b6('dul ba): ches pas brtsigs shing brtsigs shing rdib nas sbyin bdag dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag gson zhing 'dug ste/ 'tsho zhing sdod pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang dag kyang 'di ltar 'jig na/
216b7('dul ba): shi ba rnams kyi ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag gis mkhar lan gyi rgyur dge 'dun la mi zad pa dbul bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag mi zad pa thogs te dge slong rnams kyi gan du song nas phyin pa dang
217a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dag /mkhar lan gyi slad du mi zad pa 'di dag bzhes shig /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang
217a2('dul ba): dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas/ bdag cag mi len to/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
217a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni/ sum brtsegs su bya'o/ /dge
217a4('dul ba): slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyar khang ni/ nyis brtsegs su bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mi zad pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go/
217a5('dul ba): sbyin bdag 'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang gi mkhar len mi bgyid/ kaR+sha pa Na dag med do/ /'o na bdag cag gis khyed la mi zad pa dag ma phul lam/

217a7('dul ba): zad par 'gyur te/ ci/ bdag cag gi sdum pa na gnas ma mchis snyam mam/ ci'i slad du rab tu sbyor bar mi mdzad/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi
217b1('dul ba): bca' bar mdzad pas/ bdag cag rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
217b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar lan gyi rgyu mi zad pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa 'bul nas/
217b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa rab tu sbyar bar bya zhing / de las skyed gang grub pa des/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
217b4('dul ba): 'dun la mchod par bya'o/ /de dag gis de dag nyid la byin nas de dag la bdas pa na rtsod par byed cing / 'phags pa dag /ci'i phyir bdag nyid kyi nor las rtsod pa byung zhes zer ba'i skabs de/

217b6('dul ba): na mthu dang ldan pa la brten cing mi ster ba dang / bla'i grwa'i mthus mi ster nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis dbul po rnams la byin nas
217b7('dul ba): de dag gis kyang 'jal mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gta' nyi rir blangs te dbang po dang bcas pa'i dam rgya'i glegs bu bris te sbyin par bya'o/ /glegs bu de la yang lo dang /
218a1('dul ba): zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / dge skos dang / len pa po dang / rdzas dang / skyed rnams kyi ming bri bar bya'o/ /gang la sbyin par bya ba dge
218a2('dul ba): bsnyen dad pa can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba la yang gta' nyi ri kho nas sbyin par bya'o/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /

218a4('dul ba): de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ tshong bar byed do/ /ji ltar len par byed ce na/ gang gi tshe ljongs su lo legs shing grong
218a5('dul ba): khyer du lo nyes pa de'i tshe na/ ljongs nas grong khyer du len par byed do/ /de ltar len par byed do/ /ji ltar gtong bar byed ce na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer du lo legs shing ljongs su lo nyes pa de'i tshe na/ grong
218a6('dul ba): khyer nas ljongs su gtong bar byed de/ de ltar gtong bar byed do/ /ji ltar nyo bar byed ce na/ gang gi tshe rin chung ba de'i tshe na nyo bar byed de/ de ltar nyo bar byed do/ /ji ltar tshong bar byed ce na/ gang gi
218a7('dul ba): tshe na rin che ba de'i tshe na tshong bar byed de/ de ltar tshong bar byed do/ /gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni/ ma log/ ma spangs/ so sor ma spangs pa yin te/

218b2('dul ba): gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed/ tshong bar byed na/ shAkya'i dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di la bye brag ni/ ci yod/ bsam pa ni/ ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni/ ci yod/ su zhig dge

219a1('dul ba): rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi
219a2('dul ba): bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang nyo tshong

219a4('dul ba): mang po'o/ /byed na zhes bya ba ni/ len par byed pa dang / gtong bar byed pa dang / nyo bar byed pa dang / tshong bar byed pa dag lhag par spyod par byed na'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni/

219b2('dul ba): sbyor bas snga ma'i rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs
219b3('dul ba): pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na byang lam pa'i tshong pa lam gyi bgrod par zhugs pa dag gis gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang
219b4('dul ba): ldan pa/ skar khung skar khung dra ba can dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ mig dang snying 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa dag mthong nas de dag dad par gyur te/ de dag gtsug lag khang
219b5('dul ba): du dong nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gis dge 'dun la mchod ston bgyi'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ mchod ston gyi yo byad dag khyer te shog

220b1('dul ba): thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis khyab par byas pas phyin chad gang nas kyang rnyed pa sgrub par mi nus so/ /snyam nas de de snyam sems pa na/ dga' 'dun
220b2('dul ba): drug cu skyed mos tshal du dong ba de dag nye dgas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di dag las rnyed pa ma grub na/ nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming gzung bar mi bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /drug
220b3('dul ba): sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na/ nyan pa po dag bdag cag gis rang gi sha dag bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam du sems la/ gal te tshul khrims kyi

220b5('dul ba): du sems pa yin pas/ des lhung bzed gsal ba/ zlum pa/ longs spyad par bzod pa mchan khung gis khyer te dga' 'dun de dag ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas dga' 'dun pa gcig la ci nas kyang
220b6('dul ba): de'i sems mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i gtam byas nas sems dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci'i phyir byon/ nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag la lhung bzed
220b7('dul ba): dgos so/ /'phags pa/ bdag la lhung bzed ma mchis te/ gal te rin gyis rnyed na/ bdag gis 'jal te gsol lo/ /nye dgas lhung bzed mchan khung nas phyung ste de la bstan nas smras pa/
221a1('dul ba): bzhin bzang / lhung bzed 'di yang rin gyis rnyed pa yin no/ /'phags pa/ 'di'i rin ci tsam/ kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'o/ /bdag gis 'di'i rin kaR+sha pa Na drug cu
221a2('dul ba): 'bul lo/ /bzhin bzang / a rog kya/ de dag khyod kyir gyur cig /sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang /
221a3('dul ba): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig /de bzhin du des dga' 'dun drug cu po dag re re yang kaR+sha pa Na drug cu drug cu sbyor du bcug nas song ngo / /dga' 'dun de dag thams cad
221a4('dul ba): gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ de na dga' 'dun gcig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bos btsun pa nye dga' shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ chos sgrog pa/ rig pa dang grol ba'i

221a6('dul ba): kho bos kyang phul lo/ /de bzhin du thams cad kyis kho bos kyang phul lo/ /kho bos kyang phul lo/ /zhes smras nas de dag phan tshun blta bar brtsams te/ shes ldan dag/ dge slong gcig la lhung
221a7('dul ba): bzed du dgos zhes de dag gis dge slong zhig la dris pa/ 'phags pa/ dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du 'tshal/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag/ gcig kho na dgos so/ /de dag gis
221b1('dul ba): shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams ni/ rnyed pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dag yin no/ /zhes smad par brtsams so/ /de ni/ re zhig byung ba yin gyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba
221b2('dul ba): la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
221b3('dul ba): na dge slong drug sde dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog gsog par byed cing / bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/ dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed nas dge slong don nyung du dag/ ci'i phyir

221b5('dul ba): zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun
