331a5('dul ba): smra ba'i bsam pas/ tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ thag pa las rab tu
331a6('dul ba): byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ thag bzang dang / son pa dang / dru gu dang / snas la sogs pas rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur
331a7('dul ba): kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi
331b1('dul ba): tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ rgyang shing dang / skud pa dang / tshon dang / phur pa dang / so mang gis rang gi
331b2('dul ba): las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ bzang mkhan las rab tu
331b3('dul ba): byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/
331b4('dul ba): khab dang / skud pa dang / gri dang / chan pa dang / lcug mos rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis
331b5('dul ba): mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ lcags mkhar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ lcags
331b6('dul ba): mkhar las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ sbud pa dang / sbud ru dang / ti tsha dang / skam pa dang / tho bas rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma
331b7('dul ba): gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul
332a1('dul ba): ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ sbud pa dang / sbud ru dang / ti tsha dang / skam
332a2('dul ba): pa dang / tho bas rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam
332a3('dul ba): pas/ ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ ko lpags mkhan las
332a4('dul ba): rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ rgyus pa dang / rgyi'u dang / 'breng bu dang / dra gri dang / smyung dang / smyung bus rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur
332a5('dul ba): kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan
332a6('dul ba): pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo dang / dbyig gu dang / tha gu
332a7('dul ba): dang / 'khor lo'i rten ma dang / gsal gyis rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis
332b1('dul ba): mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ 'breg
332b2('dul ba): mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ spu gri dang / chan pa dang / bdar dang / smang tsher dang / sen gris rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung /
332b3('dul ba): ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul
332b4('dul ba): ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ ste'u dang / sta re dang / gzong dang / sog le dang / tho bas rang gi las bya'o/ /
332b5('dul ba): zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan
332b6('dul ba): du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ smyig ma
332b7('dul ba): dang / gri dang / tshon dang / smyug tho dang / lhang tsher gyi rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i
333a1('dul ba): skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan
333a2('dul ba): pa ni/ bran las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ bsku mnye dang / dril phyi dang / khrus dang / pho nyar 'gro ba dang / mngag pas rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa
333a3('dul ba): gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa
333a4('dul ba): la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ 'theng po dang / smad 'chal dang / zhar ba dang / lag sor rdum po dang / sgur po dang / mi'u thung dang / lba ba can dang /
333a5('dul ba): glen pa dang / lkug pa dang / grum po dang / 'on pa dang / rten 'phye dang / rkang bam las rab tu byung ba yin no/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung
333a6('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa
333a7('dul ba): ni/ mdze can dang / 'brum bu phra mo can dang / ngal skyen pa can dang / shu ba can dang / g.yan pa can dang / khyi rdo can dang / glog pa can dang / rkang shu can dang / skyigs bu can dang / skyug bro can dang
333b1('dul ba): khong skem can dang / rims can dang / rims drag po can dang / lud pa can dang / dbugs mi bde ba can dang / skem nad can dang / brjed byed can dang / bkres pa can dang / skya rbab can dang / tshil po che dang / skran
333b2('dul ba): can dang / khrag nad can dang / mkhris nad can dang / mtshan par rdol ba las rab tu byung ba yin no/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur
333b3('dul ba): ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ pham par
333b4('dul ba): 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba yin no/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang
333b5('dul ba): rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/ dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la
333b6('dul ba): yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / dngan dus can dang / phrag dog can dang / ser sna can dang / g.yon can dang / sgyu can dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa
333b7('dul ba): dag/ sdig pa 'dod pa dang / log par lta ba yin no/ /zhes smras na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i
334a1('dul ba): bsam pas/ dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ ro lta bu yin no/ /zhes bya ba
334a2('dul ba): la sogs pa'i spyo ba dag gis spyo bar byed na/ dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung / ma gyur kyang rung / dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gal te ming de lta bu mang po dag yod par gyur na/ de
334a3('dul ba): la lan gdab par smra ba sangs rgyas skyong gang yin zhes zer ba la/ bram ze las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma lta bu dag brjod pa la ltung ba med do/ /las dang po pa dang /
334a4('dul ba): smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i ltung byed de/ gnyis pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
334a5('dul ba): yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag dge slong rnams la phra mas kun tu spyod par byed de/ phra mas kun tu spyod pa na dge
334a6('dul ba): slong dag spa gong ba dang / gzengs dmas pa dang / zhum par gyur nas lung mnod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba dang / nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar
334a7('dul ba): byed/ 'di ltar dus yun ring po nas nye bar bsags pa/ chos dang ldan pa'i gcugs pa'i rgyun yad gcod par byed nas/ dge slong don nyung ngu dag/ ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams la phra
334b1('dul ba): mas kun tu spyod par byed ces smod par byed/ 'phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di
334b2('dul ba): dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa
334b3('dul ba): ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed dge slong rnams la phra mas kun tu spyod pa bden nam/ btsun
334b4('dul ba): pa/ mad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/ /zhes
334b5('dul ba): rnam par smad par mdzad do/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ 'das pa'i dus na nags tshal zhig na seng ge mo sbrum ma zhig 'dug ste/ seng ge mo rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe 'brang pa'i dus la
334b6('dul ba): bab pa de'i tshe na sha'i tshogs byas te 'brang bar byed pas/ seng ge mo de/ ba lang gi tshogs chen po zhig gi phyi bzhin du rjes su song ba dang / ba 'brangs nas ring po ma lon pa be'u rjes su skyong bar byed
334b7('dul ba): pa zhig khyu'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ba de/ seng ge mo des bsad nas sha khyer te rang gi tshang du song ngo / /be'u de yang ma'i nu ma 'thung 'dod pas de'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du song ba dang / seng ge mos bsam pa/ be'u
335a1('dul ba): 'di yang gsad par bya'o/ /snyam na yang bsam pa/ gal te bdag gis bu 'brangs par gyur na/ 'di de'i chung po grogs su 'gyur gyi/ mi gsad do snyam mo/ /seng ge mo de
335a2('dul ba): 'brangs nas de las phru gu pho zhig byung ba dang / seng ge mo des rang gi phru gu dang / be'u de gnyis ka nu ma bsnun par brtsams nas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyi ga chen por gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig
335a3('dul ba): na seng ge de na bar gyur nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smras pa/ bu gnyis/ khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/ phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi/ kho mo 'das pa'i
335a4('dul ba): 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing / mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha'
335a5('dul ba): ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /seng ge de ri dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dam pa dag za zhing khrag mang po dag 'thung bas chen por gyur to/ /khyu
335a6('dul ba): mchog de yang seng ges bsrungs pa'i rtswa bzang po dag za zhing chu gtsang ma dag 'thung bas chen por gyur to/ /ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge de la wa rgan po rab tu brkam pa/ lhag ma za ba zhig 'khor zhing / phyi
335a7('dul ba): bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang nas seng ge des ri dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing / khrag dam pa dag 'thungs nas/ bag tsha ba med par de na 'dug pas/ phyogs der gcan
335b1('dul ba): gzan phra mo gzhan dag gis nye mi phod pas/ wa rgan po de seng ge des ri dwags dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa 'thungs pa'i sha'i lhag ma dang / khrag gi lhag ma dag za zhing
335b2('dul ba): 'thung bas/ pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag rgyas par gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ge de ri dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa dag 'thungs nas myur
335b3('dul ba): ba myur bar kho nar tshang du song ste khyu mchog de dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug par byed nas/ sha'i lhag ma de dag kyang gcan gzan phra mo gzhan dag gis zos nas wa rgan po des bsam pa/ seng ge 'di gang
335b4('dul ba): du 'gro ba je blta bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de de'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du song ba dang / ji tsam na khyu mchog dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ khyu mchog 'di/ bdag gi lto'i dgrar gyur pa
335b5('dul ba): yin gyi/ bdag gi 'di gnyis dbye bar bya'o/ /snyam nas wa rgan po des khyu mchog de'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang / khyu mchog gis smras pa/ zhang po/ rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/ was smras pa/
335b6('dul ba): tsha bo/ rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag ldang ngo / /ci nyes/ seng ge 'di na re/ kho bo'i sha tshogs rgyu khyu mchog de gar song / gang gi tshe kho bos sha gzhan ma rnyed pa de'i tshe kho bos khyu mchog 'di bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes
335b7('dul ba): zer ro/ /khyu mchog gis smras pa/ zhang po/ kho bo cag gnyis la mas 'chi khar/ bu gnyis/ khyed nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/ phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi/ kho
336a1('dul ba): mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes kha chems bzhag gi khyod de skad ma zer cig /was smras pa/ tsha bo/ khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi
336a2('dul ba): nyan na/ chud zos par 'ong ngo / /khyu mchog gis smras pa/ zhang po/ go rim ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/ was smras pa/ tsha bo/ seng ge 'di tshang nas byung nas bya smyangs byed par 'gyur la/ bya smyangs byas nas
336a3('dul ba): glal bar 'gyur zhing / glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar 'gyur/ phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung ste khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na/ khyod kyis bdag
336a4('dul ba): 'dis gsad do/ /snyam du shes par gyis shig /wa de/ de'i 'og tu seng ge'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang / seng ges smras pa/ zhang po/ rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/ was smras pa/ tsha bo/ rlung
336a5('dul ba): rab tu 'bar ba dag ldang ngo / /ci nyes/ khyu mchog 'di na re/ kho bo rtswa'i seng ge gar song / 'di'i mas kho bo'i ma bsad kyi/ 'di'i lto nges par dral bar bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /seng ges smras pa/ zhang
336a6('dul ba): po| kho bo cag gnyis la mas 'chi khar/ bu gnyis/ khyod gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/ phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi/ kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu
336a7('dul ba): khyed cag gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes kha chems bzhag gi/ khyod de skad ma zer cig /was smras pa/ tsha bo/ khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na/ chud zos
336b1('dul ba): par 'ong ngo / /seng ges smras pa/ zhang po/ go rims ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/ was smras pa/ tsha bo/ khyu mchog 'di lhas nas byung nas bya smyangs byed par 'gyur la/ bya smyangs byas nas 'bu sgra 'byin par 'gyur
336b2('dul ba): zhing / 'bu sgra phyung nas phug thrig byed par 'gyur/ phug thrig byas nas rngam pa byas te khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur pa na/ khyod kyis bdag 'dis gsad do/ /snyam du shes par gyis shig /de gnyis rang
336b3('dul ba): bzhin gyis rtag tu de ltar byed mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang phan tshun mtshan mar ma bzung ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge de tshang nas byung nas bya smyangs byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir
336b4('dul ba): rnam par bltas te/ seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung nas khyu mchog gi mdun du song ngo / /khyu mchog de yang lhas nas byung nas bya smyangs byas te/ 'bu sgra phyung nas phug thrig byas te rngam pa byas nas seng ge'i
336b5('dul ba): mdun du song ngo / /de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de ltar byed mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang mtshan mar ma bzung ste/ gang gi tshe rgyud la dbyen gyi sa bon btab pa de'i tshe na mtshan mar bzung bas/ khyu mchog gis kyang
336b6('dul ba): bdag 'dis gsad do/ /snyam du bsam la/ seng ges kyang bdag 'dis gsad do/ /snyam du bsam nas/ seng ges khyu mchog gi brang la sder mo btab pa dang / khyu mchog gis kyang rwas seng ge'i lto dral nas/
336b7('dul ba): de gnyis ka dus la bab pa dang / lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ bzang po dag la lta ba'i mis/ /skye bo ngan pa bsten mi bya/ /seng ge khyu mchog mdza' ba la/ /wa yis tha dad phye la ltos/ /dge slong dag /re
337a1('dul ba): zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang phra mas kun nas spyod pa na gsod par sems na/ mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge
337a2('dul ba): slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun tu spyad par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun tu spyod par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung 'das pa'i dus na/ nags
337a3('dul ba): tshal zhig na seng ge mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig dang / stag mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug ste/ seng ge mo spyod yul du song ba dang / de'i phru gu de 'khyams pa na stag mo'i gan du song nas stag mos de mthong
337a4('dul ba): nas bsam pa/ 'di gsad par bya'o/ /snyam nas yang bsam pa/ 'di bdag gi bu'i chung po grogs su 'gyur gyi/ mi gsad do/ /snyam nas des de nu ma bsnun par brtsams so/ /seng ge mo des kyang spyod
337a5('dul ba): yul rgyus te phyir 'ongs pa dang / ji tsam na phru gu mi snang nas des de btsal bar brtsams pa dang / des phru gu stag mos bsnun pa mthong ngo / /stag mo des kyang seng ge mo de mthong nas skrag ste 'bros
337a6('dul ba): par brtsams pa dang / seng ge mo des stag mo la smras pa/ nu mo/ ma 'bros shig dang lhan cig 'khod par bya ste/ 'di ltar/ kho mo spyod yul du song ba na/ khyod kyis kho mo'i phru gu la mkho ba bstabs
337a7('dul ba): pas| gal te spyod yul du 'gro bar gyur na/ kho mos kyang khyod kyi phru gu la mkho ba bstab par bya'o/ /de gnyis lhan cig 'khod par brtsams nas de gnyis kyis/ seng ge'i phru gu'i ming ni/ mche
337b1('dul ba): bzang zhes bya bar btags/ stag gi phru gu'i ming ni/ dpung bzang zhes bya bar btags nas de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na chen por gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na seng ge mo dang stag mo gnyis na bar gyur nas
337b2('dul ba): de gnyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bu gnyis la smras pa/ bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/ phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi/ kho mo cag gnyis 'das pa'i
337b3('dul ba): 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyis mtha' 'dzad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson
337b4('dul ba): po'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /seng ge ni/ ri dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag za bar byed/ khrag dam pa dag 'thung bar byed cing / de
337b5('dul ba): sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa dag 'thungs nas myur ba myur ba kho nar tshang du 'gro bar byed do/ /stag ni/ spyod yul du song nas tshegs chen pos ri dwags dag bsad de/ sha dang khrag zos shing
337b6('dul ba): 'thungs nas yun ring pos phyir 'ong ngo / /dus gzhan zhig na stag gi lhag rol dag sbas nas des de zos te myur du phyir 'ongs pa dang / seng ges stag la smras pa/ khyod sngon chad ni/ yun ring zhig gis phyir
337b7('dul ba): 'ong na/ deng myur du phyir 'ongs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ stag gis smras pa/ kho bos/ lhag rol sbas par gyur pa de zos te phyir 'ongs so/ /seng ges smras pa/ khyod lhag rol sbed dam/ stag gis smras pa/ sbed
338a1('dul ba): do| |seng ges smras pa/ kho bo ni/ ri dwags dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa zos shing khrag dam pa 'thungs nas ltos pa med par 'gro'o/ /stag gis smras pa/ khyod ni/
338a2('dul ba): stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ kho bos ni/ de ltar byed mi nus so/ /seng ges smras pa/ bdag cag lhan cig 'dong ngo / /de gnyis lhan cig 'dong bar brtsams so/ /ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge
338a3('dul ba): de la wa rgan po rab tu gdu ba/ lhag ma za ba zhig 'khor zhing phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brang ba des bsam pa/ stag 'di/ bdag gi lto'i dgrar gyur pa yin gyi/ 'di gnyis dbye bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de
338a4('dul ba): nas wa rgan po der seng ge'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang / seng ges smras pa/ zhang po/ rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/ was smras pa/ tsha bo/ rlung rab tu 'bar bdag ldang ngo / /ci nyes/ stag
338a5('dul ba): 'di na re/ kho bo'i rtswa'i seng ge de gar song / des kho bo lhag ma zar bcug gi/ kho bos de nges par gsad par bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /seng ges smras pa/ zhang po/ kho bo cag gnyis la ma gnyis kyis
338a6('dul ba): 'chi khar/ bu gnyis/ khyod gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/ phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi/ kho mo cag gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis
338a7('dul ba): 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes kha chems bzhag gi/ khyod de skad ma zer cig /was smras pa/ tsha bo/ khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na/ chud zos par 'ong ngo / /seng ges
338b1('dul ba): smras pa/ zhang po/ go rim ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/ was smras pa/ tsha bo stag 'di tshang nas bya smyangs byed par 'gyur la/ bya smyangs byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing / glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta
338b2('dul ba): bar 'gyur/ phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas stag gi skad thang gsum phyung ste khyod kyi mdun du 'ongs par 'gyur ba na/ khyod kyis bdag 'dis gsad do/ /snyam du shes par gyis shig /de'i 'og tu
338b3('dul ba): stag gi mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang / stag gis smras pa/ zhang po/ rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/ was smras pa/ tsha bo/ rlung rab tu tsha ba 'bar ba dag ldang ngo / /ci nyes/ seng ge 'di na re/ kho bo'i rtsa'i
338b4('dul ba): stag de gar song / de nges par gsad par bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /stag gis smras pa/ zhang po/ kho bo cag gnyis la ma gnyis kyis 'chi khar/ bu gnyis/ khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin
338b5('dul ba): la/ phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi/ khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o/ /zhes kha chems bzhag gi/ khyod de skad ma zer cig /was smras pa/ tsha bo/
338b6('dul ba): khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na/ chud zos par 'ong ngo / /zhang po/ go rim ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/ was smras pa/ tsha bo/ seng ge 'di tshang nas byung nas bya smyangs byed par 'gyur la/ bya
338b7('dul ba): smyangs byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing / glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar 'gyur/ phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung ste khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na/
339a1('dul ba): khyod kyis bdag 'dis gsad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du shes par bya'o/ /de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de ltar byed mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo / /dus gzhan
339a2('dul ba): zhig na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge de tshang nas bya smyangs byas te/ glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung nas stag gi mdun du song ngo / /stag kyang tshang nas byung
339a3('dul ba): nas bya smyangs byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/ stag skad thang gsum phyung nas seng ge'i mdun du song ngo / /de gnyis rtag tu de ltar byed mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang mtshan mar
339a4('dul ba): ma bzung ste/ gang gi tshe rgyud la dbyen gyi sa bon btab pa de'i tshe mtshan mar bzung bas/ seng ges kyang bdag 'dis gsad do/ /snyam du bsam la/ stag gis kyang bdag 'dis gsad do/ /snyam
339a5('dul ba): bsam mo/ /yang seng ges bsam pa/ bdag ni/ stobs dang ldan pa yin la/ stag ni/ de lta ma yin pas 'dis bdag la rgol mi nus kyi/ je brtag par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des tshigs su bcad
339a6('dul ba): pas smras pa/ chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang / /rtsal dang shugs dang ldan pa yi/ /mche ba bzang la rgol byed pa/ /dpung bzang de ni rigs pa min/ /stag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ chu
339a7('dul ba): zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang / /rtsal dang shugs dang ldan pa yi/ /dpung bzang la ni rgol byed pa/ /mche bzang de ni rigs pa min/ /seng ges smras pa/ khyod la sus smras/ stag gis smras pa/ wa
339b1('dul ba): 'dis so/ /stag gis smras pa/ khyod la sus smras/ seng ges smras pa/ wa 'dis so/ /seng ges bsam pa/ 'dis bdag cag gnyis 'byed par byed do/ /snyam nas/ des wa de thal lcag gis bsnun te
339b2('dul ba): bsad pa dang / lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gzhan gyi tshig gis mdza' bshes mi spang zhing / /gzhan gyis smras pa dag la brtag par bya/ /'byed par 'dod pa skabs tshol byed pas na/ /skye bo phra
339b3('dul ba): ma can la yid mi rton/ /wa skyes grong pa rdzun du smra byed pa/ /mdza' bshes 'byed par byed pas skyes ta re/ /phra ma smra ba de ni bsad gyur nas/ /bde bas mdza' bshes dga' bar byed la ltos/ /dge
339b4('dul ba): slong dag/ re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang phra mas kun tu spyod pa na/ gsod par sems na mi rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge
339b5('dul ba): slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun tu spyad par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas spyod par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad
339b6('dul ba): nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/ 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs
339b7('dul ba): pa snga ma bzhin no/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong la phra ma byed na/ ltung byed do/ /dge slong la phra ma byed na zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong la phra ma bya
340a1('dul ba): ba'i bsam pas ngag dang / tshig dang / tha snyad dang / skad dang / rjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / tshig gi lam dang / tshig gi sgra dang / ngag gi las dang / ngag gi rnam par rig byed
340a2('dul ba): smras pa'o/ /ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung bdag tu sreg par byed/ 'tshod par byed/ ltung bar byed pa'o/ /
340a3('dul ba): gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing / so sor ma bshags nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/ de na ltung byed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ bar sdom
340a4('dul ba): la| rigs dang bzo dang las dang ni/ /rtag nad ltung ba sde lnga dang / /nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams dang ni/ /spyo bar byed pa tha ma yin/ /dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung
340a5('dul ba): ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa khyed la dge slong na re/ tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin
340a6('dul ba): zhes zer te/ dge slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ ming brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rigs dang / rus brjod pa la nyes

340b1('dul ba): la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin no/ /zhes zer te/ dge slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya zhes smras

341a1('dul ba): tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba yin no/ /zhes zer te/ dge slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya zhes

342b7('dul ba): dang / spyod pa dang / gtsang sgra dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / thal ba blang ba dang / bya ma bu ma blang ba dang / sa blang ba dang / lag stangs dang / thor tshugs dang / rab bsngags bya ba dang / kye zhes bya ba dang / nges brjod
343a1('dul ba): kyi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / srid srung gi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin byed pa dang mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang klog tu
343a2('dul ba): 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa dang / len pa dag bslab par bya'o/ /zhes zer te/ dge slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ ming brjod pa la nyes

343a5('dul ba): po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phong dang phyir bsnur ba dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang / zhags pas
343a6('dul ba): gdab pa dang / mda' bo che 'phen thabs dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stangs dang / thor tshugs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbug pa dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / gnad
343a7('dul ba): du phog pa dang / mi tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag bslab par bya'o/ /zhes zer te/ dge slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ ming

349b1('dul ba): mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ spu gri dang / chan pa dang / bdar dang / smang tsher dang / sen gris rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes zer te/ dge slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/
349b2('dul ba): rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/ ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/ rigs dang / rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas/

349b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa ni/ smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/ smyig ma dang / gri dang / tshon dang / smyug tho dang / lhang tsher gyis rang gi las bya'o/ /zhes zer te/ dge
350a1('dul ba): slong gang zhe na/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya/ zhes smras na/ ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/ rigs dang / rus brjod pa

350a6('dul ba): ga la yod/ bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa ni/ 'theng po dang / smad 'chal dang / zhar ba dang / lag sor rdum po dang / sgur po dang / mi'u thung dang / wa ba can dang / glen pa dang / lkug pa

351b2('dul ba): rung / rdzun yang rung / thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/ /dge slong la phra ma byed pa'i ltung byed
